summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, authorizing the acquisition of an easement for street purposes for the improvement of two alleys located between Deiridge Way Southwest and 18th Avenue Southwest, from Southwest Cloverdale Street to Southwest thistle Street ("alley in Block 7, Plat of Liberty Division No. 1, et al, Project, Local Improvement District No. 6719"); increasing objects of expenditure in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Operating Fund.
